advancements.foragecraft.has_gathering_k: Craft a gathering knife with a stick and a flat rock.
advancements.foragecraft.has_straw.desc: Use a gathering knife to get straw from some grass.
advancements.foragecraft.foraged_root_ve: Forage a potato, carrot, or beetroot from the ground.
advancements.foragecraft.foraged_poisono: Forage a poisonous potato from the ground.
advancements.foragecraft.foraged_flint.d: Forage a piece of flint from dirt or some stone.
advancements.foragecraft.foraged_bone.de: Forage a bone from the ground.
advancements.foragecraft.foraged_gold_nu: Forage a gold nugget from some stone.
advancements.foragecraft.foraged_skeleto: Forage a skeleton skull from the ground.
advancements.foragecraft.foraged_diamond: Forage a diamond from some coal ore.
advancements.foragecraft.foraged_emerald: Forage an emerald from some coal ore.
Steal some leek seeds from a village house chest.
advancements.foragecraft.has_leek.desc: Get your hands on a leek.
advancements.foragecraft.has_spaghetti.d: Make yourself some Spaghetti and Meatblocks.
advancements.foragecraft.triple_baka.des: Harass a mob with a leek.
patchouli.foragecraft.name: Foraging Research
patchouli.foragecraft.landing_text: Congratulations on crafting a piece of paper and shoving it with dirt to get here! Welcome to the $(bold)Foraging Research Journal!$() The more you learn, the more you uncover, so get digging!
